episodes.title: Yaniv Fituci // Attack Co-Founder & Executive Producer
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira

episodes.title: Zack Pearlman // Alt-Actor & Yuge Donald Trump Supporter
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira

episodes.title: Andrey “Reynad” Yanyuk // Tempo Storm & Hearthstone
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Reynad stops by Pointless to talk competetive Hearthstone, crazy Amsterdam stories, and of course, Legendary Leia.

episodes.title: Sarah Lane // G4TV & Producer
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Sarah Lane of Tech TV and G4TV fame talks about her past, present, and future on today's Pointless.

episodes.title: Casey Crescenzo // “The Dear Hunter” & Artist
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Lead-singer and song writer for "The Dear Hunter," Casey Crescenzo is in the studio and Kevin can't help but fanboy. Watch as Casey discusses his creative process, life musings, and a special Pointless Podcast exclusive.

episodes.title: Brooke Van Poppelen // “Hack My Life” & Comedian
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Joining Pointless today is writer and comedian, Brooke Van Poppelen to discuss writing comedy, TruTV's "Hack My Life," and America's future overlord we affectionately refer to as president!

episodes.title: NYC Rambling: Failing Forward
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: This year I launched a new production company and built out a full studio to create shows for Comic-Con HQ. That ride came to a sudden, screeching halt. Here’s my honest, albeit rambling untangling of the last two weeks.

episodes.title: Amy Vorpahl // Writer & Actress
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Amy leaves the confines of her cubicle to discuss her disdain for dragons of a certain type, her RPG roots, and her crazy college days on this week's Pointless.

episodes.title: Attack Fam // Alex Corea, Carlos Rivera, Jacob Strouckel, & Joey Thimian
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: This week we get to know some the people behind the scenes that make the magic happen here at the Attack studios.

episodes.title: Pointless Podcast // Sara Underwood and Candace Bailey RERUN
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Kevin reunites with his "Attack of the Show!" co-hosts, Candace Bailey and Sara Underwood. Follow @saraunderwood and @candacebailey5!

episodes.title: The Dear Hunter: Acts and Origins II
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Alex Dandino sits down with Casey Crescenzo of The Dear Hunter to discuss the band’s Acts 1 – 5. Pre-order ACT V: Hymns with the Devil in Confessional now at http://www.thedearhunter.com

episodes.title: Alberto “Crumbz” Rengifo // League of Legends & Coach
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: League of Legends Pro Crumbz gives Kevin all the details about living in a gaming team house, unwinding between bouts of LoL, and the future of eSports on this week's Pointless Podcast.

episodes.title: The Dear Hunter: Acts and Origins
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Alex Dandino sits down with Casey Crescenzo of The Dear Hunter to discuss the band's Acts 1 - 5. Pre-order ACT V: Hymns with the Devil in Confessional now at http://www.thedearhunter.com

episodes.title: Brian Redban // Joe Rogan Experience & Deathsquad
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Returning to Pointless, Brian Redban gets down and dirty with gas station male enhancement pills, the future of smart cars, and dumb Apple design choices on this week's show.

episodes.title: Pointless Ramblings // A KP Status Update
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira

episodes.title: Derrick Beckles // Comedian & Director
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Comedian and director Derrick Beckles pores over his life as a comic and clears up some head-scratching Wikipedia citations in the process on this week's Pointless Podcast.

episodes.title: Erica Rhodes // Actress & Comedian
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Comedian Erica Rhodes explores the therapeutic benefits of trampolines, dating, and doing comedy on this week's Pointless Podcast.

episodes.title: Tiffany Smith // Actress & Host of “DC All Access”
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: DC's Tiffany Smith discusses the trials and rewards of growing up a nerd, recreational drug use (or lack thereof), and a twisted take on Disneyland.

episodes.title: Frank Grillo // The Purge: Election Year & Actor
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Actor Frank Grillo talks about his early career as a Wall Street stock broker, acting on soap operas, and and his new film, The Purge: Election Year.

episodes.title: David Farrier // Journalist and Filmmaker of “Tickled”
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Journalist turned filmmaker David Farrier discusses the finer points of professional tickling, Trent Reznor, and his new documentary, Tickled.

episodes.title: Mike Diva // Director & Special Effects Artist
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Mike Diva steps into the studio and talks to Kevin about spending a weekend in jail, his rise to the YouTube annals of greatness, and of course our lord and savior, Trump-san.

episodes.title: Echo Fox // ProoFy & Neslo
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Competitive Call of Duty Players Neslo (Jeremy Olsen) and Proofy (Jordan Cannon) sit down with Kevin and talk eSports training, performance enhancing drugs, and Echo Fox Gaming.

episodes.title: Sam Reich // CollegeHumor & Producer
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Producer and comedian Sam Reich talks with Kevin about bad high school experiences, the upcoming of CollegeHumor, and the strange world of politics.

episodes.title: Janina Gavankar // Actress & Musician
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Actress-singer-nerd Janina Gavankar and Kevin talk TV, Hulu, and inspiring the youth. Plus, her thoughts on the taste of Soylent after trying it for the first time.

episodes.title: Attack Media Producers // Alex Corea, Corrado Caretto, Jeremy Hache
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Kevin and fellow Attack producers Alex Corea, Corrado Caretto, and Jeremy Hache discuss all the makings of our new studio, plans with Twitch, the work with Comic Con HQ, and of course, memories from G4 and "Attack of the Show!"

episodes.title: Amy Roiland // Founder of FashionTap & Model
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Amy Roiland, CEO and founder of FashionTap, tells Kevin all about the experience of pitching her app on Shark Tank, playing VR with her brother Justin, creator of Rick and Morty, and how she sees the fashion industry changing.

episodes.title: Malik Forte // Nerdist & Entertainer
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Nerdist`s Malik Forte lets it all hang out this week on Pointless and shares details about growing up in Ohio, his virtual reality obsession, and his beef with politics. Tune in and call off work because this episode is sick! Get all the latest updates from Malik on : https://twitter.com/Malik4Play

episodes.title: Julia Voth // Actress & Cosplayer
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Model-actress Julia Voth of Resident Evil fame is into cool stuff like cosplay and gaming, but what she does to pass her time at Burning Man was enough to make even Kevin blush. Don't miss this very candid episode of Pointless. Get the latest updates from Julia on her twitter: https://twitter.com/juliavoth Get Behind the scenes videos with Julia on her Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/JuliaVothVideoStream

episodes.title: Ari Shaffir // This Is Not Happening & Comedian
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Actor-comedian Ari Shaffir held nothing back on Pointless today. Check out his eye opening accounts on life’s most pressing issues, like bad mushroom trips and incredible sex. Keep up to date with Ari`s shows on his official website: http://www.arishaffir.com/

episodes.title: Jim Hefner // Owner of Just Float
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Jim Hefner and Kevin talk about the science of sensory deprivation and its benefits. Jim founded his float tank facilities Just Float back in 2013 in Pasadena, CA and has since then grown it into a mainstream industry pushing forward a unique method of meditation in the Los Angeles area.

episodes.title: Eden Dranger // Comedian & “Snacks & Hacks”
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: This week, comedian Eden Dranger joins Kevin to talk about comedy club catastrophes, her voracious appetite for doughnuts, and the culinary podcast she’s created to help satiate her cravings. Find out what she’s cooking on this delectable edition of Pointless!

episodes.title: Phil LaMarr //  Pulp Fiction & Voice Actor
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Phil LaMarr, actor, comedian, and man of a thousand voices, stopped by the Pointless studio to talk about his career as a voice over artist. From his job on Mr T: The Animated Series at the tender age of 16 to voicing fan favorite Futurama, you won’t believe the stuff that come out of his mouth!

episodes.title: Chantal Claret // Netflix`s Love & Morningwood
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Chanel Claret joins Kevin for the Pointless Podcast to talk about her tour adventures, acting, and eating shark. Chantal has been entertaining the music industry for the past 10 years with her band Morningwood touring around the Globe. Her record labels include major labels such as MTV Networks, Capitol Records, & TheEnd Records. She is also becoming an upcoming actor by being in Netflix`s new series "Love" that is out now on Netflix. Follow Chantal on : https://twitter.com/chantalclaret Keep updated and visit Chantal`s Official Website: www.chantalclaret.com/

episodes.title: Zach Leary // Podcaster & Psychedelics Enthusiast
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Zach Leary hopped on the Pointless Podcast to talk with Kevin about deprivation tanks, self-driving cars, and meditation.

episodes.title: Troy Baker // Voice Actor & The Joker
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Troy Baker enchanted the Pointless Podcast to talk with Kevin about his move to Los Angles, becoming a voice actor, and Christopher Walken. Is your college making a difference in your community? Share your community service photos or videos to Instagram or TIDAL page. Use ‪#‎TIDALXChange‬ for a chance to have Lil Wayne perform at your school!

episodes.title: Those Who Can’t // Grawlix Comedy
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: The guys from TruTV's "Those Who Can't" come by the Pointless Podcast to talk about how mad it's possible to get in front of a green screen, why they set their show in a high school, and Leisure Suit Larry.

episodes.title: Jake and Amir // College Humor & If I Were You
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Jake Hurwitz and Amir Blumenfeld stopped by the Pointless Podcast to talk about making Jake and Amir, Amir's Birthday Party, and Squatty Potties.

episodes.title: Ryan Vance // X-Play & G4
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Executive Producer of X-play and G4TV.com, Ryan Vance came on the Pointless Podcast to talk about the Tech-TV/G4 merger, what he is up to now, and how to make anything better with a monkey.

episodes.title: Eddie Schmidt // Director
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Director Eddie Schmidt came by the Pointless Podcast to talk with Kevin about his new Netflix series with Chelsea Handler, his work on Attack of the Show, and his upbringing in comedy.

episodes.title: Yaniv Fituci // Attack of the Show & The Attack
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Kevin's partner in crime Yaniv Fituci finally got in front the mic on a very special Pointless Podcast. They told tales of #BrostaRica, their history as friends, and what the future holds for The Attack.

episodes.title: Virtual Reality Los Angeles // Cosmo Scharf
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Virtual Reality Los Angeles Convention Founder Cosmo Scharf stopped by the Pointless Podcast to talk with Kevin about the future of VR, VR porn, and what they are excited to see in the world of Virtual Reality this year.

episodes.title: Chris Kasick // Attack of the Show & G4
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Kevin's old G4 buddy Chris Kasick stopped by the studio to talk about the G4 days, past relationships, and creepy uncles.

episodes.title: Andrea Lowell // Playboy Radio & Actress
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Andrea Lowell stopped by the Pointless Podcast to talk with Kevin about threesomes, how to maintain a healthy body, and how her mom found out she worked at playboy.

episodes.title: Freddie Wong // Rocket Jump & Video Game High School
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Freddie Wong came back on the Pointless Podcast to talk with Kevin about redesigning the Foot Segway, his new Hulu show, and what games he is playing.

episodes.title: Bobcat Goldthwait // Actor & Director
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Bobcat Goldthwait (Police Academy, Jimmy Kimmel Show) stopped by the podcast to talk about why he makes movies, remembering his friend Robin Williams, and Dubstep.

episodes.title: Zelda Williams // Actress & Voice Over Actress
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Zelda Williams (Legend of Korra, TMNT) stopped by the Pointless Podcast to talk with Kevin about what games she is currently into, her days as a bar doorman, and social media.

episodes.title: Lisa S. // Model & Actress
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Lisa S came by the Pointless Podcast to talk to Kevin about her love of all things nerd, the Chinese modeling industry, and her childhood as a Deadhead.

episodes.title: Brendon Small Returns // Metalocalypse
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Brendon Small returned to the Pointless Podcast to catch up with Kevin about Metalocolypse, drugs, and getting punched in the face.

episodes.title: Adam Sessler // X-Play & Rev3Games
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Adam Sessler came by the Pointless Podcast to talk with his old friend Kevin about his departure from X-Play, what games he's excited for, and his new game Friday the 13th: The Game!

episodes.title: Dee Murthy // FiveFour & Young & Reckless
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Dee Murthy stopped by the Pointless Podcast to talk about how he started his clothing brand, what its like owning a business, and all the weird stuff he and Kevin used to eat as kids.

episodes.title: Mitchell Davis // YouTuber
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Mitchell Davis sat down with Kevin to talk about how he balances his life, his dream of freezing himself, and Kevin's new word game.

episodes.title: Andrew Bowen // MADtv & Johnny Cage
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Andrew Bowen sat down with Kevin to talk about how he got his start as an Actor, how he started doing impersonations, and him hosting this year's Geekie Awards.

episodes.title: Steve Zaragoza // SourceFedNERD
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Steve Zaragoza from SourceFed talked with Kevin about Olive Garden mistakes, Butt Stuff, and how to get out of a creative rut.

episodes.title: Mike Shaw // Nerdist & Attack of the Show
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Mike Shaw sits down with his old friend Kevin to reminisce about working on Attack of the Show together, his time at Nerdist, and get DEEP about religion and spirituality.

episodes.title: Trisha Hershberger // Escapist & SourceFed
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Trisha Hershberger sat down with Kevin to talk about her love of computer gaming, growing up (almost) amish, and how she fights road rage with WWE action figures.

episodes.title: Andrew Bowser // Nerdist & Weird Satanist Guy
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Andrew Bowser sat down with Kevin to talk about growing up as a child actor, how he started filmmaking in the digital space, and how he came up with the character Onyx the Fortuitous.

episodes.title: TheZombiUnicorn // Twitch Streamer & Commentator
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: TheZombiUnicorn (Natalie Casanova) sat down with Kevin to talk about her path to becoming a Twitch Streamer, her love of gaming, and the future of live streaming.

episodes.title: Rick and Morty // Justin Roiland & Ryan Ridley
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Justin Roiland and Ryan Ridley of Rick and Morty stop by the studio to talk with Kevin about how they met each other, the beginning of the show, and may have even done some voices!

episodes.title: POINTLESS #121: Rocket League // Game Developers
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira

episodes.title: Milana Vayntrub // Actress & Writer
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: The wonderful Milana Vayntrub stopped by to talk about what makes her happy, how she got into acting, and what its like to do AT&T Commercials.

episodes.title: Anna Akana // Actress & YouTuber
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: The wonderful Anna Akana stopped by the studio to talk about auditioning, her start in comedy, and how tragedy got her to do what she loves. Back that ish up! Go to http://Backblaze.com/pointless to get a no-risk free 2 week trial!

episodes.title: Jeremy Hache // Livestream & Riot Games
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Kevin's old friend Jeremy Hache stops by to see The Attack studio, unveil the shroud of secrecy surrounding RIOT games, and talk about the old Attack of the Show days.

episodes.title: Jake Strouckel // PDP & Game Wizard
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Our old friend Jake Strouckel (PDP Jake) talked with Kevin about the ins and outs of a gaming company, how he got into games, and why he would trust is with his nice headsets.

episodes.title: Soma and Jon Carnage // Twitch Directors
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Soma and Jon Carnage of Twitch talk about how they found Twitch, the future of the platform, and how live-streaming got started.

episodes.title: Greg Miller // Host & Writer
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Greg Miller of Kinda Funny graced the studio to talk with Kevin about his rise to IGN, running Kinda Funny, and some college stories.

episodes.title: Kyle Newacheck // Director & Musician
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Kyle Newacheck of Fade Up Fade Out Bye Bye/Workaholics and Danny Webber stopped by to talk about their new album, growing up in the bay, and how Workaholics got started.

episodes.title: Brea Grant // Actress & Writer
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: The lovely Brea Grant stopped by the studio to talk about getting her laptop stolen, farts, and what its like to date Kevin.

episodes.title: Allie Goertz // Singer & Songwriter
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Allie Goertz met up with Kevin in New Jersey to talk about her Journey as a musician, nerdy girls, and then Allie plays some songs!

episodes.title: Alex Winter // Director & Actor
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Director Alex Winter stops by for a quick discussion about internet privacy, Bill and Ted, and his new movie Deep Web.

episodes.title: Colton Dunn // Writer & Actor
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Colton Dunn stops by Pointless to talk with Kevin about writing on Key and Peele, his new pilot, and Rooster Teeth's Laser Team.

episodes.title: David Brevik // Diablo & Marvel Heroes
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: David Brevik visited the Twitch Studio to talk to Kevin about making Diablo 2, Battlenet, and one of the most popular MMO's in the world, Marvel Heroes.

episodes.title: Joe Lynch // Director
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Joe Lynch stopped by to catch up with Kevin and talk about their favorite movies, Quentin Tarantino, and tell some crazy stories.

episodes.title: James Byrkit // Director
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: James Bykrit stopped by to talk to Kevin about his work on Rango, Pirates of the Caribbean, and how he shot one of Kevin's favorite movies this year, Coherence.

episodes.title: POINTLESS #106: Brian Redban // Comedian & Podcaster
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Brian Redban returns to the Pointless podcast to catch up with Kevin and talk about Dreamcast, Laser Disk, Livestreaming, current tech, and whatever other crazy ish Redban is up to.

episodes.title: Alessandra Torresani // Actress
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Ten kinds of adorable Alessandra Torresani stops by to talk about her dating habits, working with the Workaholics guys, and her time at G4.

episodes.title: Broken Lizard // Super Troopers 2!
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Broken Lizard's Kevin Heffernan and Steve Lemme stop by the studio to talk with Kev about Super Troopers 2, crowd-funding it on Kickstarter, and answer fan questions. Listen or watch right meow!

episodes.title: Adrianne Curry // Model & Twitch Streamer
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: The lovely Adrianne Curry hopped on the Pointless Podcast and Livestream to talk about past relationship troubles, a new relationship, and fun Twitch whatnots.

episodes.title: Thomas Middleditch // Actor & Comedian
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Thomas Middleditch of Silicon Valley came onto our stream and podcast to talk LAN parties, early days of Silicon Valley, and about his first time streaming on Twitch.

episodes.title: DuckSauce // Twitch Streamer & Actor
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Matthew "DuckSauce" Rhode graced our stream and podcast to share his road to becoming a Twitch stream superstar, as well as how he sustains a daily stream, and how he keeps his voice so dreamalicious.

episodes.title: Wil Wheaton // Actor & Host
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Wil Wheaton came by to celebrate the 100th episode and talk about his show, net neutrality, and his time in the rave scene.

episodes.title: Grace Helbig // Queen of YouTube & Host
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Grace Helbig returned to the Pointless studio to talk to Kevin about her new talk show, snapchat etiquette, and to answer your most pressing questions.

episodes.title: Brett Gelman // Actor & Comedian
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Brett Gelman stops by to talk to Kevin about working with Adult Swim, messed up internet videos, and his new special "Dinner With Family with Brett Gelman and His Family"!

episodes.title: Brendon Small // Metalocalypse Creator & Comedian
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Brendon Small takes time off his busy shredding schedule to talk with Kevin about tour bus etiquette, fleshy slide whistles, and creating Metalocalypse and Home Movies.

episodes.title: Jessica Chobot // Host of Nerdist News
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Jessica Chobot came to visit Kevin and talk about her time at IGN, having a baby, and working at G4!

episodes.title: Jordan Morris // Writer & Host
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Jordan Morris came by to talk to Kevin about what they're playing, writing for @midnight, and their new Juggalo podcast.

episodes.title: Blair Herter // Host & Trophy Husband
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Blair Herter visited his old friend Kevin to talk about his days at MTV and G4, owning a human baby, and nerdy exercise.

episodes.title: Peri // Tech Startup & Audiophiles
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Kevin has creators of the Peri Duo on to talk about the tech design process, CES, and all the challenges of a tech startup.

episodes.title: Anna David // G4 Alum & Author
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: The wonderful Anna David sat down with Kevin and talked about her audition for Attack of the Show, starting her media empire, and her battle with addiction.

episodes.title: Greg Grunberg // Actor & Hero
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: The amazing Greg Grunberg visits the studio to talk with Kevin about voiceover acting, weird twitter interactions, and having a son with epilepsy.

episodes.title: Charles Hirschhorn // Founder of G4
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Original Founder of G4 Charles Hirschhorn sits down to tell the full tale of the network's conception, as well as his take on G4's cancellation and the brand's potential.

episodes.title: Kevin’s Peru Memoir // Special Guest Jeff Cannata
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Jeff Cannata hosts a special episode of Pointless as Kevin gives a full re-telling of his trip to Peru! Cosby and Ferguson are discussed! GO TO http://www.craftvapery.com/ and use promo code POINTLESS for 25% off purchases and 50% off your first month's subscription!

episodes.title: Craft Vapery // G4 Alumni & Vape Kings
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Josh, Omri, Rob, and Kevin are back to stuff your non-denominational holiday socks with vaping goodies and talk about their G4 days! GO TO http://www.craftvapery.com/ and use promo code POINTLESS for 25% off purchases and 50% off first month subscriptions!

episodes.title: Zack Pearlman // Actor & Comedian
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Actor, Comedian, and Cyborg Jesus Co-Creator Zack Pearlman is back in the pointless studio with Kevin! They talk Mulaney and Hearthstone!

episodes.title: Flula Borg // Youtuber & Musician
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Kevin invites the hilarious DJ Flula Borg onto the show to talk about coming to America, the music biz, youtubes, & more!

episodes.title: Isaiah Mustafa // The Man Your Man Could Smell Like
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Old Spice spokesman and actor extraordinaire, Isaiah Mustafa, stops by to talk with his old friend Kevin in the Pointless Studio......on a horse!

episodes.title: Seth Laderman // Vice President of Nerdist Industries
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Vice President of Nerdist Industries, Seth Laderman, came on Pointless to pop his podcast cherry with Kevin. They have a seriously insightful talk about creating content, Nerdist, and Super Creative. Plus all things Ghost Huntin', ass slappin', and wizard farting.

episodes.title: Ana Kasparian // Co-host & Producer of The Young Turks
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Ana Kasparian sits down with Kevin for an unprecedented third time on Pointless! They talk ebola, money in politics, and some steamy relationship tidbits.

episodes.title: Nilay Patel // Editor-In-Chief of The Verge
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: The Verge Editor-in-Cheif, Nilay Patel, sits down with Kevin for one last #Pointless podcast in NYC. They talk about starting Polygon, wearable tech, and Gamergate.

episodes.title: Sandeep Parikh & Brea Grant
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Sandeep Parikh and Brea Grant meet their old friend Kevin in the studio to talk crazy girlfriend stories, their group trip to Italy, and the making of Real Housewives of Horror! Look for RHoH coming out October 27th on Nerdist.com! Watch the first ep of Real Housewives of Horror!

episodes.title: Taryn Southern
episodes.author: Kevin Pereira
episodes.summary: Kevin is back in LA and brings in old friend and actress, singer, model, Taryn Southern, to the Pointless studio.
